body: When copying card images from data folder of previous version of the game, the ignore property is not checked.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Ignore property in card script not checked when getting images from previous version

comments.body: This has been fixed by revision 9266debfda28 , right?
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Right. Forgot to close the issue, thanks for the reminder.

**Status:** Fixed

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on April 01, 2012 22:36:18_

When copying card images from data folder of previous version of the game, the ignore property is not checked.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=200_
